==== symbolType6.ts (1 errors) ====
    var s = Symbol.for("add");
            ~~~~~~
!!! error TS2304: Cannot find name 'Symbol'.
    var a: any;
    s + s;
    s - s;
    s + "";
    s + a;
    s + 0;
    "" + s;
    a + s;
    0 + s;
    s - 0;
    0 - s;
